website_summaries.verdict: Premium cat food that contains holistic whole meat and non-GMO vegetables.
pros: Contains no artificial flavors, colors, or preservatives
cons: Lots of crumbs with each scoop

customer_reviews.title: They changed the formula
customer_reviews.text: Amazon sent me what I guess is a new formula and my cat is throwing up. I've contacted Halo to see what to do. Spots Stew was great. Not sure why my cat is throwing it up. Very unhappy. Amazon needs to update their info. They have the wrong ingredients listed and when I look back at previous purchases, it's like I bought this but I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Why did you Change the formula
customer_reviews.text: My cat is not ready to eat it any more.. My cat use to love this food but now since they changed the formula both of them are not even tasting it. This big bag is going to be trashed..
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it, which is great because they don't normally have interest in dry food. I have proof the cats destroyed both bags I bought. My female has had sores in her mouth and antibiotics didn't clear it up 90 dollar vet visit. If that didn't work they'd do steroids I'm sure another 90 dollar vet visit. This cost me 36 bucks and her sores have healed! Awesome food.
customer_reviews.author: VikBrit

customer_reviews.title: Awful. Disappointed with new formulation
customer_reviews.text: The white bag has been reformulated where the cat food does not smell delicious, the shape changed from circular to triangular, and there is a lot of crumbs with each scoop. The original orange bag version was great and we had auto-ordered it. We are no longer buying this food and changing brands.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine C.

customer_reviews.title: Big Changes, Big Price
customer_reviews.text: Changing my review because they totally changed this product. Even my chow-hound kittens who'll eat anything you drop won't touch it. It's also $10+ more than it used to be, to add insult to injury: forced to switch brands. Spot's was the best: this seems to be a decent quality food going by the label, but it's just not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Sola

customer_reviews.title: My nearly 21 year old cat is quite finicky and ...
customer_reviews.text: My nearly 21 year old cat is quite finicky and sensitive about what she'll eat. We rotate through wet food, because she can't make up her mind. But this is a staple, a daily dry food. She eats it, and loves it. She tried the Salmon, and wouldn't eat it. We also feed 1 cup of this daily to an outdoor feral. He used to not be fussy about food, but lately won't finish the wet food we have given from time to time. He gobbles this up every day. We started buying the 11# bag for the two cats, as it's less expensive than the 6# bag from Whole Foods.
customer_reviews.author: EmElle

customer_reviews.title: Powdery
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few months (probably close to a year). It has helped with my cat throwing up. However, the last 2 bags I purchased are very "powdery". Like the stuff that's usually at the bottom of the bag, but it's throughout. Will be looking for another product.
customer_reviews.author: Becky L

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula is worse
customer_reviews.text: Changed an excellent formula and packaging for a cheap one. Cats and me are not happy.
customer_reviews.author: King Elessar

customer_reviews.title: I changed foods - and was I sorry! Back to Halo and nothing but!
customer_reviews.text: 3 months ago, I thought I should save some money by changing to a pet store's branded food. At first, no problem. But within a short time, I noticed changes in my cats' coats, energy levels, skin condition (they were scratching as if they had fleas!) and heaven help me, stool odor - the worst! Back on Halo, and within days - not weeks - their stools no longer reek, they are no longer scratching and I will never, never stop feeding them Halo. Never again. Halo is the best food, and I feel as if I am assuring long and happy life for my "girls" by feeding them the best.
customer_reviews.author: CindiMc

customer_reviews.title: Kibble size
customer_reviews.text: The kibble size was incredibly tiny. I tried for a month to transition my cats over. I don't think it was the taste so much as when they ate the Halo kibble the pieces were just swallowed whole I believe because they were too small to actually chew. My cats kept defaulting to their larger kibble which I think they preferred because they could sink their teeth into something. I wanted to return the product but was given full refund no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great company, great ingredients, but my cat didn't tolerate it well
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this food for my cat because Halo is a cruelty-free company! However, my cat has an extreme sensitivity to everything except her old food, so I can no longer feed her Halo - it caused her to vomit and itch. I would still recommend trying this product for most cats, though! Halo offers a money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied, so I received a full refund. For most cats, this is a great cat food brand to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kris E.

customer_reviews.title: Best pet food
customer_reviews.text: My four babies have been on this food since they turned one. They are 6 now. Ingredients is great. Even got my grandma's senior dog on it and it gives her more energy. You would think the dog was 3 the way she acts a fool running around, but she's 13. It does nothing for her grey hair or the sagging skin on her neck, but hey she's an old woman, Lol
customer_reviews.author: Brina D

customer_reviews.title: Good that I switched to grain free, whole meat food
customer_reviews.text: I was feeding my cat Purina cat chow not realizing how important are the ingredients. Then I came across an article about cat food and came to know how most cheap cat food have meals and by-products. I started looking for good quality food and Halo was one of the options. I have started seeing noticable difference in my cat's coat. It's thick and shiney. Fur shedding has also stopped. Please look at the ingredients carefully before choosing your pet's food.
customer_reviews.author: Gauri Wagle

customer_reviews.title: Our Cats love it so much they drag the bag to us for food!!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats 15 and 7 love this food. It helps with digestion and that yucky urine and poop smell are reduced. Our picky cats eat Halo food up. They beg for dinner... and snacks! One of our cats has bad indigestion and she has not thrown up this food as much as she did another brand. We are thankful we found Halo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to transition my cats to this when they were half done with their regular food. The next day my kittens chewed a hole through this bag! They LOVE it. They're still transitioning with the mixed foods but I'm sure when they move over to Halo alone there will be no compliants!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only cat food we feed our spoiled furry babies
customer_reviews.text: This is the only kind of cat food we feed our very spoiled feline babies. It has never upset their gut (they will throw up wheat grass but not this), never been recalled, and our veterinarian said it was very nutritionally sound. I want to ensure that our kitty cats are able to be healthy, and this food helps me feel like I am doing everything I can to ensure that is possible.
customer_reviews.author: Mack Momma

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Crack
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats, of all ages and health concerns. Two of them are extremely picky and I only feed them the best food. I've been through almost a dozen of the best brands etc and this is the one they love most. My elderly, sensitive tummy one eats this and their wet food version. Grain free is the only way to go, I just give him 1/4 of a pepcid AC (10 mg) daily to help control upset stomach. Glad I found this little company, hope they maintain quality levels. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: GtrAde

customer_reviews.title: My cats love Halo
customer_reviews.text: Healthy cat food that both my calico and siamese LOVE. My calico is a very picky eater and only likes this stuff which is unfortunate for my wallet but definitely nice having ordering options of Halo on prime. Saves me a bit of money when I order bigger sizes. :) cheaper than natural grocers but the same quality product. Never have had issues and order 1x a month
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: CW
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love this product. We use to buy Natural Balance, but unfortunately they discontinued the product we were purchasing. We, my wife and I , researched different grain free cat foods and this seemed to be a good choice. Our cats are satisfied with it. It also comes in a larger size bag than the Natural Balance product we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cat food ever
customer_reviews.text: My cat eats less, poops less, and begs for food less this is such a high quality diet. Her coat is so soft and smooth, I even think she sheds less. I’ll never try another cat food again
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: This is getting out of hand.... way expensive !!!
customer_reviews.text: When I first started feeding my cat this food in 2015 I was buying 11.25 pound bags for $37 now that same bag of cat food for years later it’s $57 this is really good food but it is absolutely ridiculous how expensive it’s getting I’m going to have to change brands in spite of the fact that she’s doing great on it I just can’t afford to keep feeding her this.
customer_reviews.author: Domenic P Croce

customer_reviews.title: Great cat food...
customer_reviews.text: This is great cat food. My cats love it and don't puke like they do with other foods. Just wish it came in a much bigger bag and didn't cost as much as it does. Why don't they make bags of cat food as big as they do for dog food? Doesn't make sense.
customer_reviews.author: CPCO

customer_reviews.title: High quality cat food
customer_reviews.text: While I was already feeding my cat Halo food, I switched to the grain free version after some research and speaking with some friends who are in the veterinary field. My cat's coat is so soft, silky, and shiny now! And honestly, her stool is a lot less offensive, which is huge considering I live in a really small NYC apartment. That, alone, makes it worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: trp9004

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES this dry food
customer_reviews.text: My cat ABSOLUTELY LOVES this dry cat food. And I love that it is made from real meat (not meat by products) and that it is grain free since, historically, grains have not been part of a cat's diet and aren't digested well. I also give my guy a quarter of a can of wet food twice a day. Both foods make him a very happy and healthy camper. I love that I can order this in bulk on Amazon! I just wish they offered subscribe and save...
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: My Kitty Hated It
customer_reviews.text: My kitty wouldn't eat this. I ordered this for my kitty who was beginning to have a weight problem because she'd eat anything and everything. But she wouldn't eat this. I ended up donating the whole bag to a shelter. I hope the kitties there liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin, RN Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: ) I started with another very good food but then I found this
customer_reviews.text: My baby was diagnosed over six years ago with CRF, and I refused to put him on any of the prescription diets. (Just read the ingredients!) I started with another very good food but then I found this, Spots Stew. It has the lowest amount of phosphorous of any other dry food while being grain-free. He loves it and is thriving.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality - Give your cats the best!
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love this food and I'm happy to buy it for them because I know what I'm feeding them is of the highest quality! It doesn't have any ingredients that are bad for your cats and I love my cats so much that I want to give them the absolute best! Comes in a nice package, but the only reason I give this 4 stars instead of 5 is that I wish the bigger 35lb. bag came with the nice zipper thing on the top like the smaller one does, instead of just a press and seal.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Lenox

customer_reviews.title: My cats are barfing and developing scabs on their skin ...
customer_reviews.text: My cats are barfing and developing scabs on their skin, it breaks my heart. I've been using halo for years, I'm not sure if I got sent the wrong kind of food, or if the formula changed along with the packaging but I hope the company tries to make this right since I now am stuck with a 6 pound bag of food that makes my cats sick.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C.

customer_reviews.title: time to look for a new cat food
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this food on subscribe and save for a while now, however I became wary with the recent formulation changes. My cats have not had any problems so far but now the price of the 11.5 pound bag has gone up $15 randomly. Time to start my hunt for a quality, cat food that won't break the bank again.
customer_reviews.author: Foxglove

customer_reviews.title: Like the package says
customer_reviews.text: Like the package says, the proof is in the poop. My cats have become pooping machines! I've also noticed less hairballs, although I'll have to give it further assessment now that it's shedding season again.
customer_reviews.author: Sydnee Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great grain free and cats like it
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing many grain free cat foods, decided to try this. Bought Flint River for years but they folded, my male cat needs grain free or else he has blood in his poop. Both our cats seem to like this......thank goodness!
customer_reviews.author: yanet

customer_reviews.title: Halo priced this customer away.
customer_reviews.text: Halo cat food is an all around great food. Nutritious and the cats loved it. However, the price hikes are absurd and tiring. Halo was a staple in our household for both cat's and our dogs food for over 8 years and will be no more. I feed a Great Dane and three cats. The price is too high!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe F.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this food and has eaten it exclusively for two years. Friends remark on her gorgeous, soft fur. Why mess with the best? I'll keep ordering Halo.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: I love this food, and that it is healthy and nutritious for my cat. Definitely makes her poop smell not as awful too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sin City Ellen uses it in Las Vegas
customer_reviews.text: As always Ellen DeGeneres food taking care of Sin City Ellen A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Rion Morgan

customer_reviews.title: The cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it! He has a sensitive stomach and needs the grain free and this formula is the best I've found from countless premium healthy brands that he is happy with. It has no byproducts and if you look at the ingredients you can pronounce them.
customer_reviews.author: LAX Angela

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Likes It
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it and it seems to help us control his kidney disease (low phosphorous food).
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S

customer_reviews.title: They love it. I have one cat with IBS and ...
customer_reviews.text: Halo is the only food my cats eat, both canned and dry. They love it. I have one cat with IBS and since starting them all on Halo exclusively, she's been eating well with no symptoms. I highly recommend Halo cat food!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Tutolo

customer_reviews.title: His fur has also improved and hair has grown back in areas that he used to scratch like crazy. Highly recommend this brand and t
customer_reviews.text: My cat used to get sick (vomit) from the store-bought food, but not anymore with this! He loves it and runs to his bowl whenever it is filled. His fur has also improved and hair has grown back in areas that he used to scratch like crazy. Highly recommend this brand and the grain-free formula for cats with sensitive stomachs.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Improved coat — shiny and smooth — noses much wetter and overall much happier pussies
customer_reviews.text: My cats Pooh used to smell like big foots bum but now it smells like potpurri
customer_reviews.author: Francesco

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best cat foods on the market in my opinion. Both of my cats love it, and they have no digestive or urinary tract issues like they did with other lesser cat foods.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: I've tried many different food choices and this seems to fit best for them both
customer_reviews.text: My two cats are very picky! I've tried many different food choices and this seems to fit best for them both. It's a little too pricey.. but very worth it. I spend more on healthy/yummy food for myself, so why not spend more on my loving cats. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good food makes good kitties
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it and their coats look and feel better than ever. =^..^=
customer_reviews.author: amazon127

customer_reviews.title: Halo Spot's Stew Grain Free Hearty Chicken
customer_reviews.text: We have three cats all love this food. Also Liv-a-Littles chicken treats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cats with new coats
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 rescues & 3 have allergies. Since taking them off purina one & using halo spots stew they all have beautiful silky coats. Their eyes are clear & bright & they don't scratch themselves raw. I'll never stop buying this food.
customer_reviews.author: Casinogirl

customer_reviews.title: but my cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a grain-free dry food my cats will eat. YMMV, but my cats love it.
customer_reviews.author: missmanytoes

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for a good price:  Snuggles says he likes it now.
customer_reviews.text: Well, Snuggles loves it. I think he is better for it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Sandstrom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it. Agrees with their digestive system. Good choice for early kidney disease.
customer_reviews.author: Phennie

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the only dry food my cats have consistently gotten excited about.
customer_reviews.author: nuddinz

customer_reviews.title: This one smells like food and I will recomend this to anyone with ...
customer_reviews.text: This one smells like food and I will recomend this to anyone with a small amount of animals that are small in size due to the quality of the product. If you have bigger animals this is going to become very expensive quick.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this brand, and their coats are amazing! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan T.

customer_reviews.title: Yay for spots stew
customer_reviews.text: My cat is quite fond of this food. Great ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Happy Family!
customer_reviews.text: Yay! Ms. Pickyeater and her little sister Eatitall both love it. Their very Celiac master also has no issues being around this gluten-free cat food :-)
customer_reviews.author: LuckyLucyLee

customer_reviews.title: High quality -  My cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really picky about what I feed my pets. They eat healthier than I do :-P Anyhow, I'm very happy with this brand and my cats love it so it a win, win fo me.
customer_reviews.author: irishLRose

customer_reviews.title: No digestion issues whatsoever. Cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it. It is free of "meals" and does not require the usual transition period when switching to a new food. No digestion issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: I. Harris

customer_reviews.title: New formula, makes cats sick. Switched to Petcurean Fresh Acres + Ziwipeak
customer_reviews.text: We used to love Spot's Stew ORIGINAL formula--when it used to be gluten free (many years ago). We tried their new formulations (this is the 2nd or 3rd new formulation), but as it keeps changing, the cats throw up more and more. After this recent change, we stopped buying Spot's Stew and transitioned to Petcurean Fresh Acres organic chicken + Ziwipeak air-dried. They have significantly reduced throwing up on Petcurean Fresh Acres + Ziwipeak.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: My cats thoroughly enjoy this brand
customer_reviews.text: The price reflects the quality of the food. My cats thoroughly enjoy this brand, and it seems to be improving their coats.
customer_reviews.author: Francis J. Secada

customer_reviews.title: great product! Ridiculous price increase since last purchase
customer_reviews.text: great product! Ridiculous price increase since last purchase. Cat's coat went from dull and scratching to glossy and thick. 5 stars except for price increases.
customer_reviews.author: mosquitoman

customer_reviews.title: Best deal there is if your cat needs and loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Best deal there is if your cat needs and loves it. We own a Abyssian and the breed dies from kidney failure w/gluten!
customer_reviews.author: Darla Fuqua

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Halo is always a good company to go with. My kitties love it, and I appreciate the healthy ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: ShelliesStar

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it, it's good for them and my Vet highly recommends it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Breaking news!
customer_reviews.text: I used it to feed my cats and they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Yummy replacement for Spot's Healthy Chicken
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned when I discovered that the Spot's Halo Hearty Chicken (no longer being produced) was replaced by Halo with Holistic Chicken. But, fortunately, my two felines devour this as quickly as they did the other. Something that might make a difference to folks using auto-feeders or timed feeders: the new triangular niblets are significantly smaller than the previous round niblets (which were small in the first place)
customer_reviews.author: ixi

customer_reviews.title: Why would I feed my kitties anything else?!?!
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this, and their coats have never been thicker or shinier. My black cat used to have this sort of odd dry skin, flaky dandruff thing going on, and since I've begun feeding this to my cats that has stopped. I simply can't rave enough about Halo, and ESPECIALLY about the grain-free food. I'll never go back to feeding my fur babies anything else!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Abbey K

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this holistic cat food. I have some sensitivities to cat dander but with this food, my cats' hairs are soft, smooth, and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Moore

customer_reviews.title: Stinky litter box, use this food to help!
customer_reviews.text: I was having issues with my cat having way too smelly sessions when she used the litter box. I decided that maybe it had to do with the food I was feeding her. I switched to this brand and problem solved!!!!! No more overly stinky litter box!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonTae

customer_reviews.title: Yum, Yum, for the kitties!
customer_reviews.text: My little cats love this food! Replaced their old (must more expensive food) after being give a sample of this at our awesome pet store. Will order this for the cats from now on.
customer_reviews.author: PixelDust

customer_reviews.title: it's suppose to be better for them anyway
customer_reviews.text: My three cats started eating it as soon as I open the bag, it's suppose to be better for them anyway. I was feeding them Purina beyond. I change brands because I thought maybe Halo was a better food for them.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: My cat makes me happy. This food makes my cat happy
customer_reviews.text: My cat makes me happy. This food makes my cat happy. Via the transitive property, this food makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt & Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 kitties love this food and I feel it's a good product for them too.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L.

customer_reviews.title: Are you sure this is cat food?
customer_reviews.text: This food smells better than most people food! My cats love it and I know they are getting the best!
customer_reviews.author: Lorilyn Schulze

customer_reviews.title: Turns to Dust
customer_reviews.text: This food literally turns to dust. The cats refuse to eat it. You pour it out solid, then as they eat it crumbles. This new formula is a total failure!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Manella

product_meta.title: Halo Grain Free Natural Dry Cat Food, Indoor Healthy Weight Chicken & Chicken Liver 11.5-Pound Bag
product_meta.description: Halo uses real WHOLE meat, poultry, or fish, and NO "meat meal" of ANY kind in our natural cat food. Our healthy weight grain free indoor cat food is made with reduced calories and fat to support weight reduction and fiber to help your cat feel full. Halo cat food is now made with Dream Coat—fatty acids from non-GMO plant sources and Vitamin E—to support healthy skin and shiny coat. We also have cat food options for special diets, including kitten food, senior cat food, and sensitive stomach cat food. At Halo, WHOLE Makes a Whole Lot of Difference is the philosophy that drives our holistic approach to ingredient sourcing, recipes, nutritional value, the welfare of ALL animals, and our overall mission to change the way companion animals are fed and farm animals are raised…for the better!
feature_bullets: COMPARE: WHOLE chicken, never ANY rendered "meat meal," like "chicken meal" or "fish meal"
Super digestibility, providing more bioavailable nutrients to your indoor cat, the Proof is in the Poop
Grain free indoor cat food made with WHOLE chicken and chicken liver, chickpeas, and non-GMO vegetables
Healthy weight recipe has reduced calories and fat, plus L-carnitine to boost metabolism, to help adult cats achieve and maintain ideal weight
Halo supports ranchers and farmers who say "yes" to responsible animal husbandry and "no" to the use of GMO feeds, and sources wild caught seafood from sustainable fisheries.
